message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you first.  I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $15,000.  What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $15,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Can we meet in the middle?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but $10,000 is quite a bit lower than I'm hoping for. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $13,000 is still a bit too high for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. Can we meet in the middle again?
